_header: Take heed before that you be not lore
_description: Death Meditations, among Latin admonitions in a similar style, at end of chapters XVII-XX of De origine Gracie — three lines with internal rhyme in the first and rough rhyme between the first and second

CULDd454.Transcription:
Take hede before þat þou be not loreThynke Thynke Thynke
                    What þou wereWhat þou art What þou schalt be
